trends: There have been no other sightings in Balancán Municipality
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was traveling with my cousin to judge a Snook Fishing Tournament in the city of Balancan, Tabasco, Mexico, and we were astonished by the clearness of the sky, so we decided, just 2 miles before arriving to Balancan, to stop the car, park, and take some pictures with my HP935 digital camera, I wantes to photograph the sky, for with an automatic 20 to 30 sec exposure, I can capture several stars, as Orion in the first pic, but the funny thing is that when we got to the hotel, and downloaded the pics to my lap-top, we saw several lines and flashig signs, something I couldn���t identify from where I was standing, I know astronomy and Aviation, and I am a biologist, so I know this is not an airplane, not a satellite, and not a firefly, so what is it?, I would certainly would like to hear some opinions. In the second pic you can see the main light on the left, but if you look closely, there is a second pattern to it���s right, and a very light third pattern at the bottom of 1 and 2. And the third pic is simply awsome, howcome I couldn���t detect that with the simple eye?, no doubdt I wasn���t looking for wierd stuff. The bright spot on the third image is sirius, in the first image you can see Orion, and checking the 3 pics, you can see some "Stars" in one pic, and they are absent in others, ??? The pics ware taken with the camera lying on the roof of the car, with timer sutter on, the car turned off, and nobody on board or touching it, in order not to cause any movement, and there was no wind, it was one of those beautiful nights.
Summary: Movement not detected with eye, detected by 30 sec exposure.
